fullText:
Bold Spirit

Epic Tier
Prerequisite: 21st level, warlord, Bravura Presence class feature
Benefit: When you are hit by a melee attack while you are bloodied or granting combat advantage to the attacker, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier after the attack is resolved.

Published in Martial Power, page(s) 145.
name: Bold Spirit
prerequisite: 21st level, warlord, Bravura Presence class feature
benefit: When you are hit by a melee attack while you are bloodied or granting combat advantage to the attacker, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier after the attack is resolved.
